 (sql/with-query-results rows [(format "select count(*) from tbl_sales join tbl_prod on tbl_sales.product=tbl_prod.name where dayofweek(date_added)=%d and brand='Vodka'" x)] ; execute query

 ;(println x "-" (swap! hennessy conj (vals (nth rows 0))))

 (recur (- x 1))

 "Database configurations"
 (let [classname (utl/get-configuration :classname)
 subprotocol (utl/get-configuration :subprotocol)
 subname (utl/get-configuration :subname)
 user (utl/get-configuration :user)
 password (utl/get-configuration :password)]
 {:classname classname
 :subprotocol subprotocol
 :subname subname
 :user user
 :password password}))" "(defn login-test []

 (pdf/template [(.toString $id) $username $password $type]))" "(defn generate-pdf
 [title template data report & headers]
 (pdf/pdf
 [{:header title}
 (into [:table
 {:border true
 :cell-border false
 :header [{:color [0 150 150]} headers]}]
 (template data))]
 report))" "(generate-pdf "emp list" admin-template admin-report-data "report.pdf" "ID" "Username" "Password" "Type")" "(generate-pdf "emp list" admin-template admin-report-data "report.pdf" "ID" "User" "Password" "Type")" "(def login-frame

 ; set login panel to frame

 ; make frame visible
 (.setVisible true)
 ; position frame at center of screen
 (.setLocationRelativeTo nil)))"], :remote []}}
